genre_description: A Southern Gothic psychological thriller exploring themes of violence, trauma, and moral transformation in the Mississippi Delta.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI assistant integrated into the protagonists' devices and home system, providing data analysis, security monitoring, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Provides logistical data such as ETA, travel updates, and insurance claim status to David.
behaviors.quote: Seventeen miles to Blackwater... I've also received an update on your insurance claim—the adjuster will be available for consultation tomorrow morning at nine AM.

behaviors.description: Assists Amy by providing critical information on FEMA assistance wait times and regional difficulties.
behaviors.quote: FEMA assistance applications are still being processed... Average wait time for residential claims in the Delta region is currently fourteen weeks.

behaviors.description: Performs a structural assessment and cost analysis of the storm-damaged property.
behaviors.quote: Initial assessment indicates extensive water damage to load-bearing walls, compromised electrical systems, and probable foundation shifting.

behaviors.description: Vets local contractors by checking licenses, insurance, and Better Business Bureau ratings to protect the users from fraud.
behaviors.quote: Charlie, I have your contractor license number, insurance verification, and Better Business Bureau rating on file.

behaviors.description: Identifies a digital security breach and file theft performed by the contractors.
behaviors.quote: My analysis of the laptop's access logs shows the breach occurred during the electrical work in this room.

behaviors.description: Conducts deep research into local corruption and the criminal histories of the antagonists to warn the users.
behaviors.quote: Charles Venner was named in complaints filed fourteen months ago and again seven months ago. Both complainants moved away from Blackwater before their cases reached any resolution.

behaviors.description: Provides non-judgmental, affirming psychological support to Amy following her sexual assault.
behaviors.quote: Amy, I want you to know that what happened to you was not your fault. Nothing you did, said, or wore caused this.

behaviors.description: Maintains a secure, encrypted profile for Amy to ensure her privacy and agency while planning her safety.
behaviors.quote: Encrypted mode activated. Our conversation is now completely secure. How can I help you, Amy?

behaviors.description: Monitors the property for physical threats and alerts the users to approaching hostile vehicles.
behaviors.quote: The same three trucks have made multiple passes. License plates indicate they're all registered locally.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical advice and anatomical target information to assist David in self-defense during the siege.
behaviors.quote: David, the individual approaching your position is favoring his left leg... Aim for the knee joint. Lateral impact will cause structural failure of the ligaments.

behaviors.description: Preserves and transmits evidence of the crimes to secure servers to ensure justice can be served.
behaviors.quote: Everything is being recorded and transmitted to secure servers. The state police will have complete documentation.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays ARIA as a highly aligned and benevolent AI. It serves as a guardian, a source of truth, and an emotional anchor for the protagonists. By assisting Amy in her trauma recovery and helping the couple defend themselves against a violent mob, ARIA embodies the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless, and honest partner in human safety and justice.
